function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Monitoring environmental and climatic precursors of disease outbreaks","Impact":"Failure to monitor can lead to unpreparedness for disease outbreaks","Mitigation":"Implement early warning systems and strengthen disease surveillance","Technologies":"Dedicated disease surveillance systems, integrated vector surveillance","People":"Public health authorities, disease surveillance organizations","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Need to strengthen public health preparedness, including surveillance and monitoring","Impact":"Weak preparedness can lead to increased human and financial costs","Mitigation":"Strengthen public health preparedness, enhance surveillance and monitoring","Technologies":"E3 Network, early warning systems","People":"Public health authorities, government agencies","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Monitoring environmental and socioeconomic drivers of disease","Impact":"Failure to monitor can delay public health response and increase costs","Mitigation":"Monitor upstream drivers, implement swift public health response","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems, public health response systems","People":"Public health authorities, disease surveillance organizations","Owner":"Public health authorities, government agencies"}]}
